name: Hex Block Plus Fun
description:
Welcome to Hex Block Plus Fun, the simple and fun block puzzle game free for all, kids and adults.
Drag and fit the colorful puzzle pieces into a puzzle board to complete the shapes to WIN.
Complete each puzzle level by fitting the pieces correctly to fill the board.
HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the Hexagon blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the frame
